text: Pillars Stadium is a multi-purpose stadium in the Sabon Gari area Kano, Kano State, Nigeria. Its location is at the intersection of Abuja Road and Airport Road. It is currently used mostly for football matches and it is one of the two stadiums used by Kano Pillars FC, with the other being Sani Abacha Stadium. The stadium has a capacity of 10,000. In 2014 it became the temporary home of El-Kanemi Warriors after their home of Maiduguri was deemed unsafe for matches. ==References== Category:Football venues in Nigeria Category:Buildings and structures in Kano
title: Pillars Stadium
